item.title: The Last Jedi is the Perfect Star Wars for 2017
item.description: MAJOR LAST JEDI SPOILERS For the last two years, Luke’s been in my head just staring at a random women with a weapon he last saw as his right hand fell into the distance. I’ve been just hoping that whatever happened next would be badass. I was so right. But I was also wrong. Jedi has always been my superpower of choice, and Luke my number one fictional role model.
